mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM nvecaremsg a, nvecaresendlog b, nvecaresendresult c WHERE a.ecare_no = b.ecare_no AND b.ecare_no = c.ecare_no AND b.result_seq = c.result_seq

sql.if: , (SELECT error_desc FROM nvsenderr WHERE error_cd = b.error_cd) as err_msg_kor
, (SELECT cd_desc FROM nv_cd_mst WHERE cd_cat = 'AA0001' AND cd = b.error_cd AND lang = #{userVo.language}) as err_msg_kor
, (SELECT cd_desc FROM nv_cd_mst WHERE cd_cat = 'AC0001' AND cd = b.error_cd AND lang = #{userVo.language}) as err_msg_kor
, (SELECT cd_desc FROM nv_cd_mst WHERE cd_cat = 'AB0001' AND cd = b.error_cd AND lang = #{userVo.language}) as err_msg_kor
, (SELECT cd_desc FROM nv_cd_mst WHERE cd_cat IN ('AS0001','AS0002','AS0003') AND cd = b.error_cd AND lang = #{userVo.language}) as err_msg_kor
, (SELECT cd_desc FROM nv_cd_mst WHERE cd_cat IN ('AS0001','AS0002','AS0003') AND cd = b.error_cd AND lang = #{userVo.language}) as err_msg_kor
, (SELECT cd_desc FROM nv_cd_mst WHERE cd_cat = 'AF0001' AND cd = b.error_cd AND lang = #{userVo.language}) as err_msg_kor
, (SELECT cd_desc FROM nv_cd_mst WHERE cd_cat = 'AP0101' AND cd = b.error_cd AND lang = #{userVo.language}) as err_msg_kor

mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM nvecaremsg a, nvecaresendlog b, nvecaresendresult c WHERE a.ecare_no = b.ecare_no AND b.ecare_no = c.ecare_no AND b.result_seq = c.result_seq AND a.channel_type = #{channel}
AND b.error_cd NOT IN (#{errorCd})
